meanings.definition: Move or go in a furtive or stealthy manner.
meanings.sent1: The cat sneaks up on the mouse to catch it.
meanings.sent2: He sneaks out of the house to avoid being seen.
meanings.sent3: The spy sneaks around the building to gather information.
meanings.sent4: The fog sneaks in silently, covering the town in a mysterious haze.
meanings.sent5: The ninja sneaks past the guards without making a sound.

meanings.definition: Informal term for sneakers or athletic shoes.
meanings.sent1: She wore her favorite sneaks to the gym for her workout.
meanings.sent2: His old sneaks were worn out from all the running he did.
meanings.sent3: The kids raced each other in their colorful sneaks.
meanings.sent4: The basketball player's sneaks squeaked on the court during the game.
meanings.sent5: The sneaks were on sale, so she bought two pairs in different colors.

meanings.definition: A person who behaves in a deceitful or underhanded way.
meanings.sent1: The sneaks tried to cheat their way to victory in the game.
meanings.sent2: She knew he was a sneaks, always lying to get what he wanted.
meanings.sent3: The sneaks pretended to be someone else to trick people.
meanings.sent4: Beware of the sneaks who will try to manipulate you for their benefit.
meanings.sent5: The sneaks was caught red-handed stealing from the store.
